channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Integration for Windows Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Integration for Windows Login

item.title: CVE-2022-23724|2024-08-03T03:51:46.013Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20integration%20for%20windows%20login
item.description: Use of static encryption key material allows forging an authentication token to other users within a tenant organization. MFA may be bypassed by redirecting an authentication flow to a target user. To exploit the vulnerability, must have compromised user credentials.
